events.title: 14 year old Sonny Wisecarver elopes with 21 year old Elaine Monfredi

movie.title: In the Mood
movie.plot: When 15-year-old Sonny Wisecarver has an affair with his older neighbor Francine and then runs off to marry her, a stern judge has the union annulled. Then, when Sonny finds himself before the same judge after getting involved with another woman in her 20s, the publicity from this case makes him the object of affection for millions of young women

events.title: Lena Baker kills Ernest Knight in self-defence

movie.title: Hope & Redemption: The Lena Baker Story
movie.plot: Based on true events, The Lena Baker Story recounts one African-American womans struggle to rise above the challenges of her life, to face the choices she makes, and to ultimately triumph over her...Lena Baker was the first and only woman to be sentenced to death by the electric chair in the state of Georgia and was executed in 1945. She was pardoned posthumously in 2005.

events.title: Li Cunxin is released from the Chinese Consulate

movie.title: Mao's Last Dancer
movie.plot: At the age of 11, Li was plucked from a poor Chinese village by Madame Mao's cultural delegates and taken to Beijing to study ballet. In 1979, during a cultural exchange to Texas, he fell in love with an American woman. Two years later, he managed to defect and went on to perform as a principal dancer for the Houston Ballet and as a principal artist with the Australian Ballet.

events.title: the 4 police officers accused of beating Rodney King are acquitted, prompting widespread rioting

movie.title: LA 92
movie.plot: Twenty-five years after the verdict in the Rodney King trial sparked several days of protests, violence and looting in Los Angeles, LA 92 immerses viewers in that tumultuous period through stunning and rarely seen archival footage.
movie.awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 2 wins & 9 nominations.
